The researchers ' first priority has been to flesh out the very sketchy details provided on budget night about how the new fund would work , and provide the government with strong advice about its operation .

Professor Ian Frazer , whose team developed a world - first vaccine for cervical cancer and who appeared alongside Abbott on Monday , told Guardian Australia he and other researchers had advised Abbott and the health minister , Peter Dutton , that the fund should have a very broad remit beyond researching new cures .
